mdRecord.dcterms:title: School of Medicine, Second Year Class, 1946-1947
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Holsinger's Studio (Charlottesville, Va.)
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Front row(l to r): Allan Leroy Armstrong, Francis Elwood Barrett, Eugene Russell Bebeau, William Upson Cawthon, Thomas Alfred Cook, Jr., Robert Vincent Crowder, Jr., James Lovern Deadwyler, James Andrew DeLozier, Donald Hugh Ferguson, Edward Halsell Fite, Jr., William Francis Ganong. Second row(l to r): Robert Emery Gould, Cambell Harris, Jr., James Edward Henney, Frank Imboden Hobbs, Ammon Walter Hoover, William Rexford Johnson, James Bolling Jones, Leon Edward Kassell, William James Laughner, Trent Laviano, William Edgar Lawton, Jr. Third row(l to r): Miriam Lending, Ira Claire Liebrand, Bridger Pearl Little, Jr., David Craig Lucas, Robert Arthur Marks, Walter Ramon McCook, Eugene Sheldon Mendelsohn, David Alan Mullon, Joseph Allan Offen, Donald Robert Pierce, Michael Potter. Fourth row(l to r): William Francis Rienhoff, Jr., Albert Vinson Rigsbee, John Alden Rogness, John Chrysotom Rourke, John Henry Russell, Jose Anibal Semidey, Martin Herman Sternstein, David Emerson Streitmatter. Fifth row(l tor): Francis Simon Sullivan, Robert Ludwig Sundre, Charles Franklin Tate, Harry Baylor Taylor, Jr., Marvin Thalenberg, Douglas James Thompson, George Edward Traschel, John David Varner, John Marshall Vivian, Henry Harrison Wilson, Jr., Harold Ray Yarbro, Josephine Allen Young.
